label: social_support
src_text: My heart breaks for you.. please know we're sending you both love and good vibes.
augmented_text: "So sorry to hear that. Let me know if there's anything I can do to help, even if it's just lending a listening ear."

label: social_support
src_text: Much appreciated, and your responses allay our concern.
augmented_text: "Love seeing your posts and updates. Always brightens up my day. Keep shining your light! ❤️"

label: social_support
src_text: I am surprised that they let you take it, though.
augmented_text: "That's amazing! You're such a strong person, I'm sure you'll get through this no problem."

label: social_support
src_text: Thank you giving me a place to share my love for these wonderful souls.
augmented_text: "Virtual hugs to all! Your kindness and generosity never fail to amaze me. So grateful for this support system."

label: social_support
src_text: Some kind soul here in our sub suggested Sailor Kin-Mokusei (thank you!
augmented_text: "Just wanted to send some positive vibes your way, hope you're doing okay! 💕"

label: social_support
src_text: I guess this is just where we disagree, but thank you for he thoughtful response.
augmented_text: "Sorry to hear about your loss. My heart goes out to you and your family. If there's anything I can do to support you, don't hesitate to reach out."

label: social_support
src_text: I've been trying to reconnect with my father's heritage, so I greatly appreciate your patience and cooperation.
augmented_text: "Feeling overwhelmed? Let's chat and offer some support. We're stronger together than we are alone."

label: social_support
src_text: Thank you for being inquisitive and frank and I'm glad we are having this conversation.
augmented_text: "I know things have been tough lately, but I want you to know that I'm always here to listen and offer any help I can."

label: social_support
src_text: I think you're better off on your own than with an unsupportive partner anyway.
augmented_text: "Sending you all my positive vibes and support during this difficult time! You got this!"

label: social_support
src_text: While my questions were rhetorical thank you for the detailed answers.
augmented_text: "Love having friends like you who lift me up and make me feel seen. You rock!"

label: social_support
src_text: Thank you for being inquisitive and frank and I'm glad we are having this conversation.
augmented_text: "Your strength and resilience inspire me every day. If there's anything I can do to support you further, don't hesitate to ask."

label: social_support
src_text: Much appreciated, and your responses allay our concern.
augmented_text: "So grateful for our friendship. You always know how to make me feel better when I'm down."

label: social_support
src_text: I'd consider it a loss and if you get lucky it may be recovered.
augmented_text: "Hang in there, friend! You got this. And if you need someone to talk to, I'm always here for you."

label: social_support
src_text: Thank you giving me a place to share my love for these wonderful souls.
augmented_text: "So glad to be part of a group that values empathy and compassion. Your messages always brighten up my day!"

label: social_support
src_text: When I got done he was like, you've never done that before!
augmented_text: "I'm always here to lend a listening ear and offer advice whenever you need it. You're not alone in this journey."
